sentences.english: He self-reflected and decided to decrease the stress and clean up his diet, looking beyond the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 他能自我反醒并决定减少压力和调整饮食，改变现状。

sentences.english: So don. t lose sight of your healthy diet pyramid when you do your shopping.
sentences.chinese: 所以你购物时要记起健康饮食金字塔。
蔗糖是日常饮食中必不可少的。

sentences.english: I did 30-day trials both with the macrobiotic diet and with the raw foods diet.
sentences.chinese: 我试验了30天的长寿饮食和生食饮食。

sentences.english: I did 30-day trials both with the macrobiotic diet and with the raw foods diet.
sentences.chinese: 我试验了30天的长寿饮食和生食饮食。

sentences.english: The profession and the public do not appreciate that advertising claims come without proof in the case of diets.
sentences.chinese: 医生同业和大众没有察知广告所宣称的饮食并无论证。

sentences.english: Is natural diet right for your ferret ?
sentences.chinese: 自然的饮食来源对貂是好的吗？

sentences.english: Eating caveman style is about PRINCIPLES.
sentences.chinese: 穴居人的饮食习惯就是遵守原则。

sentences.english: If there is a dietician guides you to improve your diet habit, would it be healthier than before?
sentences.chinese: 如果有营养师指导你的饮食，会否对你的健康有帮助？

sentences.english: Life teachers in our school take charge of students' daily life.
sentences.chinese: 学校配有生活老师，照顾学生的饮食起居。

sentences.english: Different people who live in different countries have different customs for eating food.
sentences.chinese: 居住在不同的国家，人民吃的食物与饮食风俗就不同。

sentences.english: Pre-exercise high-fat diet rats in each group body weight was no significant difference.
sentences.chinese: 运动期间，各组高脂饮食大鼠摄食量无统计学意义。

sentences.english: There are the metaphor phenomena by diet in Chinese ancient literature and art criticism.
sentences.chinese: 艺术批评中普遍存在着喜好借用饮食譬喻的现象。

sentences.english: Reports of variation in the stool pattern with certain elements of the diet suggest dietary intolerance.
sentences.chinese: 大便形态各异伴未消化食物提示为饮食不耐受。

sentences.english: The caretakers have to lock her up and feed her through a window.
sentences.chinese: 他们把她反锁起来而通过窗口喂她饮食。

sentences.english: Dieting is of great benefit to the over-weighted people.
sentences.chinese: 节制饮食对超重的人是非常有益的。

definition: abstain from certain food (as when ill)/avoid certain foods/be on a diet
to have three meals a day
to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
partial to (some kinds of food, usu. unhealthy)/having likes and dislikes/partial eclipse
